coreAttributes.name: Arcane lightning globe
coreAttributes.description: This curious arcane weapon takes the form of a small crystal globe, and, when held, quickly fills with a crackling, swirling maelstrom of arcane lightning. Although it's no larger than a golf ball, it holds an immense amount of arcane power, and enables its wielder to unleash arcane lightning strikes against their foes.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Fire a bolt of arcane lightning at [npc2.name].
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of the arcane lightning globe and [npc.verb(prepare)] to unleash its power.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Harnessing the power of the arcane lightning globe, [npc.name] [npc.verb(unleash)] a blast of bright pink lightning directly at [npc2.name]!

#IF(npc.isFeral()) Using the power of the small crystal globe, [npc.name] [npc.verb(launch)] a dazzling strike of arcane lightning directly at [npc2.name]! #ELSE Using the power of the small crystal globe clenched tightly in [npc.her] [npc.hand], [npc.name] [npc.verb(launch)] a dazzling strike of arcane lightning directly at [npc2.name]! #ENDIF

#IF(npc.isFeral()) A bright pink flash of arcane lightning streaks out from [npc.namePos] crystal globe, hitting [npc2.name] directly in the chest! #ELSE A bright pink flash of arcane lightning streaks out from [npc.namePos] outstretched [npc.hand], hitting [npc2.name] directly in the chest! #ENDIF

missDescriptions.missText: Harnessing the power of the arcane lightning globe, [npc.name] [npc.verb(unleash)] a blast of bright pink lightning, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.name]!
Launching a dazzling strike of arcane lightning at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(unleash)] a blast of bright pink lightning at [npc2.name], but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
